GSD.product_version: versions from v3.2 to before v5.10.83
GSD.description:
staging: rtl8192e: Fix use after free in _rtl92e_pci_disconnect()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.83 by commit 8d0163cec7de995f9eb9c3128c83fb84f0cb1c64, it was introduced in version v3.2 by commit 66898177e7e5486dc77a4ba742efa4e2e9e900a4. For more details please see the references link.
